p: Programme clips, broadcast archive materials, interviews, transcripts and three e-Books relating to the AHRC funded Earth in Vision project are freely available at www.earthinvision.org. Interviews and transcripts relating to the AHRC funded Stories of Change project are also available at www.storiesofchange.ac.uk. The paper archive that informed the Earth in Vision project was the BBC Written Archives Centre at Caversham. It is a resource available to researchers by appointment. Contact: heritage@bbc.co.uk; BBC Written Archives Centre, Peppard Road, Caversham Park, Reading, RG4 8TZ, UK. Phone: 0118-948-6281.
